definition: any property detected by the olfactory system, apply perfume to
details:
noun
- any property detected by the olfactory system
= synonyms: smell
- an odor left in passing by which a person or animal can be traced
- a distinctive odor that is pleasant
= synonyms: perfume
verb
- apply perfume to
= synonyms: perfume
- catch the scent of
= synonyms: wind
- cause to smell or be smelly
= synonyms: odorize, odorise, odourise
